text: a. License (Form 20-B) bearing no. WLF20B2022DL000354 issued on March 05, 2025 to sell, stock or offer or offer for sale, or distribute by wholesale, drugs other than those specified in Schedules C, C(1) and X of the Drugs and Cosmetics Rules, 1945 and is valid till June 19, 2030.

b. License (Form 21B) bearing no. WLF21B2022DL000351 issued on July 30, 2025 to sell, stock or exhibit or offer or sale, or distribute by wholesale, all drugs specified in Schedules C and C(1) excluding those specified in Schedule X of the Drugs and Cosmetics Rules, 1945 and is valid till June 19, 2030.
1. The Company has obtained the following licenses under the Medical Devices Rules, 2017:

a. Licence (Form MD – 15) bearing no. IMP/IVD/2020/000489 issued on May 15, 2020 under Rule 36(1) of the Medical Devices Rules, 2017 to import the medical devices manufactured by overseas manufacturer having legal and actual manufacturing site in Sweden.**@

b. Licence (Form MD – 15) bearing no. IMP/IVD/2018/000020 issued on November 12, 2018 under Rule 36(1) of the Medical Devices Rules, 2017 to import the medical devices manufactured by overseas manufacturer having manufacturing site in Sweden. *@

c. Licence (Form MD – 15) bearing no. IMP/IVD/2018/000337 issued on October 22, 2018 under Rule 36(1) of the Medical Devices Rules, 2017 to import the medical devices manufactured by overseas manufacturer having manufacturing site in Sweden. *@

d. Licence (Form MD – 15) bearing no. IMP/IVD/2021/000531 issued on December 09, 2021 under Rule 36(1) of the Medical Devices Rules, 2017 to import the medical devices manufactured by overseas manufacturer having manufacturing site in United States. **@
* Human Kappa Free Light Chain Assay
* Human Lambda Free Light Chain Assay
